content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a real gem in the city center, you know. Now, about the price, I'm sure we can find a number that satisfies both of us. Why don't you make an offer? Remember, I'm always open to suggestions, but I do hope for a fair price that reflects the quality of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. I've been doing some research, and I've noticed that similar apartments in the area are renting for around 700 Euro per month. Given the unfurnished nature of this apartment, I think an offer of 700 Euro per month would be a fair starting point. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your research, but I must say, 700 Euros seems a bit low for such a prime location. I understand you're a student, but I'm sure you'll agree that the convenience of this apartment is worth a little extra. Why don't we aim a little higher, say, 800 Euros? That's a reasonable sum for an apartment of this quality.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 800 Euros is quite generous, but as a student, I must be mindful of my budget. I'm sure you understand that I'm looking to strike a balance between quality and affordability. While the location is excellent, the unfurnished state of the apartment means I would need to invest in furniture as well. Could we possibly meet in the middle? How about 750 Euros? This would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand your concern, but 750 Euros is still quite low for such a prime location. As a landlord, I have to consider the value of the property and ensure that it is being rented at a fair price. I could consider 775 Euros, but that would be the lowest I could go. I believe this is a fair compromise, given the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 775 Euros is very close to my budget. I'm willing to accept this price, as it reflects the balance between the quality of the apartment and my financial situation as a student. Thank you for your understanding and for working with me on this. I agree to the price of 775 Euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. I look forward to having you as a tenant, Yi-Nuo. I agree to the price of 775 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
